General.Name: Booster Co. Ltd
General.Description: Booster Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells industrial boilers in South Korea. The company offers oncethrough, vacuum hot water, non-furnace scrum, no pressure hot water, and pellet boilers, as well as heat pump, particulate matter baghouse system, compact unit system, and other devices. It also provides booster system, including booster multi-control tower system, scrum system, booster internet of things system, and energy diagnostic device. The company was formerly known as Yeoryeon Boiler Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Booster Co., Ltd. in October 1988. Booster Co., Ltd. was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Jincheon-gun, South Korea.
